article: The ladies club always  _  a meeting  _  Friday afternoon and someone came to talk to them about  something important  . After that, they had tea and asked  questions  . One Friday a man came and talked to the club about the food problem. "There's not  _  food in the world for everyone," he said. "More than half of the people in the world are hungry. And when they have  _  food, they have more babies,  _  they never  _  being hungry. Somewhere in the world, a woman is having a baby every minute day and night. What are you going to do about it?" He  _  for a few seconds. Then one of the ladies said, "Well, why not  _  that woman and stop her?"
